CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusSiteAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusUltimateAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusClientAccount) , IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Satisfaction_Client__c )) = true , IMAGE("/resource/1530277791000/Case_NULL?isdtp=p1", "Non renseignée" , 32, 32) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Favorable") , IMAGE("/resource/1530277698000/Case_Satisfaction_positive?isdtp=p1", "Positive" , 32, 32), IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Neutre"),IMAGE("/resource/1530277771000/Case_Satisfaction_neutre?isdtp=p1", "Neutre", 32, 32), IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Defavorable"), IMAGE("/resource/1530277735000/Case_Satisfaction_negative?isdtp=p1", "Négative", 32, 32),
"Pas de note" )))) ,
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Satisfaction_Client__c )) = true , IMAGE("/resource/1530277791000/Case_NULL?isdtp=p1", "Non renseignée" , 32, 32) , IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Favorable") , IMAGE("/resource/1530277698000/Case_Satisfaction_positive?isdtp=p1", "Positive" , 32, 32), IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Neutre"),IMAGE("/resource/1530277771000/Case_Satisfaction_neutre?isdtp=p1", "Neutre", 32, 32), IF(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_Client__c,"Defavorable"), IMAGE("/resource/1530277735000/Case_Satisfaction_negative?isdtp=p1", "Négative", 32, 32),
"Pas de note" ))))
)
CustomField.label: Satisfaction Client
